content: 안녕하세요![neutral] I am an AI assistant.I am designed to provide simple, concise answers to your questions.I can help with a wide range of topics such as math problems, explaining concepts, setting reminders, providing news updates, and much more.[expression2] Let me know if you have any specific question!
name: Koakuma
